title.narrative: Supporting the capacity building of the Ministry of Humanitarian Affairs and Disaster Management in the Republic of Somalia

description.narrative: Strengthening systems and setting work priorities and procedures - Supporting a minimum level of human capacity at the regional level and working on training programs for employees - Supporting information technology solutions and wireless communication equipment - Establishing an early warning system - Allocating funding under partner management and coordination with the government represented by the Ministry of Humanitarian Affairs for Ministry support to respond to emergency situations and immediate logistical support purposes.

The project aims to set priorities and guide the development of the implementation plan, the development of systems and links between and within systems, technical capabilities, emergency preparedness and response planning. The project also aims to find a minimum level of trained human capacity to raise the efficiency of response in the three regions in which the trainees will work and find basic technological solutions that contribute to raising the level of communication, coordination and early warning according to criteria and mechanisms that ensure finding a good level of early procedures for crises. Contributing through the human cadres in strengthening the regional humanitarian and disaster management centers working with the ministry. And contribute to support these centers at the central and regional levels with appropriate equipment and services in the field of information technology.
